snippet: Kiss, Nirvana, Hall & Oates and the E Street Band were among inductees honored at a ceremony in Brooklyn on Thursday night.
abstract: Jon Pareles Critic's Notebook describes induction ceremony concert for the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame at Barclays Center in Brooklyn; notes inductees include Kiss, Nirvana, Peter Gabriel, Linda Ronstadt, Cat Stevens, Hall & Oates and the E Street Band.
lead_paragraph: Kiss, Nirvana, Hall & Oates and the E Street Band were among inductees honored at a ceremony in Brooklyn on Thursday night.

headline.print_headline: Rock and Roll Hall of Fame Welcomes Its Newest Members
headline.main: Rock and Roll Hall of Fame Welcomes Its Newest Members

keywords.value: Rock and Roll Hall of Fame and Museum
